This error can occur when the timeout specified was too short, or a connection to the server or proxy cannot be established.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-1074">서버 및 프록시 URL이 올바른지 확인하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-1074">Ensure that the server and proxy URL are correct.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4164">0xC004702F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4164">0xC004702F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4165">-1073450961</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4165">-1073450961</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4166">DTS_E_INVALIDUSESDISPOSITIONSVALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4166">DTS_E_INVALIDUSESDISPOSITIONSVALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4167">UsesDispositions 속성을 초기 값에서 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4167">The UsesDispositions property cannot be changed from its initial value.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4168">이 오류는 XML을 편집하고 UsesDispositions 값을 수정할 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4168">This occurs when the XML is edited and the UsesDispositions value is modified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4169">이 값은 패키지에 추가될 때 구성 요소에 의해 설정되며 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4169">This value is set by the component when it is added to the package and is not allowed to change.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4170">0xC0047030</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4170">0xC0047030</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4171">-1073450960</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4171">-1073450960</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4172">DTS_E_THREADFAILEDINITIALIZE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4172">DTS_E_THREADFAILEDINITIALIZE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4173">데이터 흐름 태스크가 필수 스레드를 초기화하지 못했으며 실행을 시작할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4173">The Data Flow task failed to initialize a required thread and cannot begin execution.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4174">이 스레드에서 이전에 특정 오류가 보고되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4174">The thread previously reported a specific error.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4180">0xC0047032</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4180">0xC0047032</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4181">-1073450958</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4181">-1073450958</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4182">DTS_E_EXECUTIONTREECYCLEADDINGSYNCHRONOUSINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4182">DTS_E_EXECUTIONTREECYCLEADDINGSYNCHRONOUSINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4183">순환이 생성되기 때문에 "%2"의 동기 입력을 "%1"(으)로 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4183">The synchronous input of "%1" cannot be set to "%2" because a cycle would be created.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4184">0xC0047033</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4184">0xC0047033</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4185">-1073450957</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4185">-1073450957</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4186">DTS_E_INVALIDCUSTOMPROPERTYNAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4186">DTS_E_INVALIDCUSTOMPROPERTYNAME</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4187">해당 이름의 스톡 속성이 있기 때문에 "%1"(이)라는 사용자 지정 속성이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4187">A custom property named "%1" is invalid because there is a stock property with that name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4188">사용자 지정 속성의 이름은 동일한 개체에 있는 스톡 속성의 이름과 같을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4188">A custom property cannot have the same name as a stock property on the same object.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4189">0xC0047035</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4189">0xC0047035</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4190">-1073450955</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4190">-1073450955</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4191">DTS_E_BUFFERLOCKUNDERFLOW</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4191">DTS_E_BUFFERLOCKUNDERFLOW</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4192">버퍼의 잠금이 이미 해제되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4192">The buffer was already unlocked.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4193">0xC0047036</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4193">0xC0047036</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4194">-1073450954</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4194">-1073450954</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4195">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALCACHEINTERFACESFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4195">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALCACHEINTERFACESFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4196">%1을(를) 초기화하지 못했으며 오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!이(가) 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4196">%1 failed initialization and returned error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4197">0xC0047037</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4197">0xC0047037</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4198">-1073450953</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4198">-1073450953</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4199">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALRELEASEINTERFACESFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4199">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALRELEASEINTERFACESFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4200">%1을(를) 종료하는 동안 오류가 발생했으며 오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!이(가) 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4200">%1 failed during shut down and returned error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4201">구성 요소가 해당 인터페이스를 해제하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4201">A component failed to release its interfaces.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4202">0xC0047038</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4202">0xC0047038</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4203">-1073450952</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4203">-1073450952</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4204">DTS_E_PRIMEOUTPUTFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4204">DTS_E_PRIMEOUTPUTFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4205">SSIS 오류 코드 DTS_E_PRIMEOUTPUTFAILED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4205">SSIS Error Code DTS_E_PRIMEOUTPUTFAILED.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4206">%1에서 PrimeOutput 메서드가 오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!을(를) 반환했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4206">The PrimeOutput method on %1 returned error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4207">파이프라인 엔진이 PrimeOutput()을 호출할 때 이 구성 요소가 오류 코드를 반환했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4207">The component returned a failure code when the pipeline engine called PrimeOutput().</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4208">이 오류 코드의 의미는 구성 요소에 따라 다르지만 파이프라인의 실행을 중지할 수도 있는 오류입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4208">The meaning of the failure code is defined by the component, but the error is fatal and the pipeline stopped executing.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4209">오류에 대한 자세한 정보와 함께 이 오류 메시지보다 먼저 게시된 오류 메시지가 있을 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4209">There may be error messages posted before this with more information about the failure.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4210">0xC0047039</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4210">0xC0047039</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4211">-1073450951</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4211">-1073450951</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4212">DTS_E_THREADCANCELLED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4212">DTS_E_THREADCANCELLED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4213">SSIS 오류 코드 DTS_E_THREADCANCELLED.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4213">SSIS Error Code DTS_E_THREADCANCELLED.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4214">스레드 "%1"이(가) 종료 신호를 받았으며 종료 중입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4214">Thread "%1" received a shutdown signal and is terminating.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4215">사용자가 종료를 요청했거나 다른 스레드의 오류로 인해 파이프라인을 종료합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4215">The user requested a shutdown, or an error in another thread is causing the pipeline to shutdown.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4216">스레드가 취소된 이유에 대한 자세한 정보와 함께 이 오류 메시지보다 먼저 게시된 오류 메시지가 있을 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4216">There may be error messages posted before this with more information on why the thread was cancelled.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4217">0xC004703A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4217">0xC004703A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4218">-1073450950</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4218">-1073450950</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4219">DTS_E_DISTRIBUTORCANTSETPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4219">DTS_E_DISTRIBUTORCANTSETPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4220">오류 0x%8.8X(으)로 인해 스레드 "%1"의 배포자가 구성 요소 "%3"에서 속성 "%2"을(를) 초기화하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4220">Distributor for thread "%1" failed to initialize property "%2" on component "%3" because of error 0x%8.8X.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4221">배포자가 구성 요소의 속성을 초기화할 수 없으며 계속 실행될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4221">The distributor could not initialize the component's property and cannot continue running.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4222">0xC004703B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4222">0xC004703B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4223">-1073450949</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4223">-1073450949</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4224">DTS_E_CANTREGISTERVIEWBUFFERTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4224">DTS_E_CANTREGISTERVIEWBUFFERTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4225">데이터 흐름 태스크가 뷰 버퍼 유형을 등록할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4225">The Data Flow task cannot register a view buffer type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4226">이 유형은 %1!d!개의 열을 가지며</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4226">The type had %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4227">입력 ID %2!d!용입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4227">columns and was for input ID %2!d!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4228">0xC004703F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4228">0xC004703F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4229">-1073450945</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4229">-1073450945</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4230">DTS_E_CANTCREATEEXECUTIONTREE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4230">DTS_E_CANTCREATEEXECUTIONTREE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4231">메모리가 부족하여 실행 트리를 만들 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4231">There is not enough memory to create an execution tree.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4232">0xC0047040</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4232">0xC0047040</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4233">-1073450944</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4233">-1073450944</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4234">DTS_E_CANTINSERTINTOHASHTABLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4234">DTS_E_CANTINSERTINTOHASHTABLE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4235">메모리가 부족하여 개체를 해시 테이블에 삽입할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4235">There is not enough memory to insert an object into the hash table.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4236">0xC0047041</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4236">0xC0047041</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4237">-1073450943</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4237">-1073450943</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4238">DTS_E_OBJECTNOTINHASHTABLE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4238">DTS_E_OBJECTNOTINHASHTABLE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4239">개체가 해시 테이블에 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4239">The object is not in the hash table.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4433">0xC0047074</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4433">0xC0047074</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4434">-1073450892</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4434">-1073450892</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4435">DTS_E_INVALIDCODEPAGE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4435">DTS_E_INVALIDCODEPAGE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4436">출력 열 "%2"(%3!d!)에 지정된 코드 페이지 %1!d!이(가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4436">The code page %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4437">잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4437">specified on output column "%2" (%3!d!) is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4438">출력 열 "%2"에 대한 다른 코드 페이지를 선택하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4438">Select a different code page for output column "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4439">0xC0047075</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4439">0xC0047075</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4440">-1073450891</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4440">-1073450891</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4441">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALPUTEVENTINFOSFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4441">DTS_E_INDIVIDUALPUTEVENTINFOSFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4442">EventInfos 컬렉션을 "%1"이(가) 캐시할 수 없으며 오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!이(가) 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4442">The EventInfos collection could not be cached by "%1" and returned error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4443">0xC0047077</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4443">0xC0047077</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4444">-1073450889</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4444">-1073450889</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4445">DTS_E_DUPLICATEOUTPUTCOLUMNNAMES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4445">DTS_E_DUPLICATEOUTPUTCOLUMNNAMES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4446">"%1"의 이름이 중복됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4446">The name for "%1" is a duplicate.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4447">모든 이름은 고유해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4447">All names must be unique.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4448">0xC0047078</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4448">0xC0047078</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4449">-1073450888</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4449">-1073450888</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4450">DTS_E_NOOUTPUTCOLUMNFORINPUTCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4450">DTS_E_NOOUTPUTCOLUMNFORINPUTCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4451">입력 열 "%1"(%2!d!)에 연결된 출력 열이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4451">There is no output column associated with input column "%1" (%2!d!).</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4452">0xC0047079</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4452">0xC0047079</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4453">-1073450887</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4453">-1073450887</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4454">DTS_E_EXCLGRPNOSYNCINP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4454">DTS_E_EXCLGRPNOSYNCINP</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4455">"%1"에 루트 원본에서 확장하는 가상 버퍼가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4455">"%1" has a virtual buffer extending from a root source.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4456">동기 입력 0이 포함된 0이 아닌 제외 그룹이 존재합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4456">There is an exclusion group that is not zero with a synchronous input that is zero.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4457">0xC004707A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4457">0xC004707A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4458">-1073450886</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4458">-1073450886</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4459">DTS_E_ERROROUTCANTBEONSYNCNONEXCLUSIVEOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4459">DTS_E_ERROROUTCANTBEONSYNCNONEXCLUSIVEOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4460">오류 출력을 비독점 동기 출력에 포함할 수 없으므로 "%1"은(는) 오류 출력이 될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4460">"%1" cannot be an error output because error outputs cannot be placed on synchronous, non-exclusive outputs.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4461">0xC004707B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4461">0xC004707B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4462">-1073450885</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4462">-1073450885</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4463">DTS_E_EXPREVALDIVBYZERO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4463">DTS_E_EXPREVALDIVBYZERO</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4464">0으로 나누기 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4464">A divide-by-zero error occurred.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4465">식 "%1"에서 오른쪽 피연산자는 0으로 계산됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4465">The right side operand evaluates to zero in the expression "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4466">0xC004707C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4466">0xC004707C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4467">-1073450884</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4467">-1073450884</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4468">DTS_E_EXPREVALLITERALOVERFLOW</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4468">DTS_E_EXPREVALLITERALOVERFLOW</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4469">리터럴 "%1"이(가) 너무 커서 %2 유형에 적합하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4469">The literal "%1" is too large to fit into type %2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4470">이 리터럴의 크기가 해당 유형을 오버플로합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4470">The magnitude of the literal overflows the type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4471">0xC004707D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4471">0xC004707D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4472">-1073450883</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4472">-1073450883</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4473">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPNUMERICOVERFLOW</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4473">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPNUMERICOVERFLOW</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4474">데이터 형식 %2 및 %3에서 이항 연산 "%1"의 결과가 숫자 유형에 대한 최대 크기를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4474">The result of the binary operation "%1" on data types %2 and %3 exceeds the maximum size for numeric types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4475">피연산자 유형이 숫자(DT_NUMERIC) 결과로 암시적으로 캐스팅될 때는 전체 자릿수 또는 소수 자릿수가 항상 손실됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4475">The operand types could not be implicitly cast into a numeric (DT_NUMERIC) result without loss of precision or scale.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4476">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 하나 또는 두 개의 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4476">To perform this operation, one or both operands need to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4477">0xC004707E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4477">0xC004707E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4478">-1073450882</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4478">-1073450882</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4479">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPOVERFLOW</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4479">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPOVERFLOW</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4480">이항 연산 "%1"의 결과가 결과 데이터 형식 "%2"에 대한 최대 크기를 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4480">The result of the binary operation "%1" exceeds the maximum size for result data type "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4481">연산 결과의 크기가 결과의 유형을 오버플로합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4481">The magnitude of the result of the operation overflows the type of the result.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4482">0xC004707F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4482">0xC004707F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4483">-1073450881</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4483">-1073450881</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4484">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONOVERFLOW</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4484">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONOVERFLOW</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4485">함수 호출 "%1"의 결과가 너무 커서 "%2" 유형에 적합하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4485">The result of the function call "%1" is too large to fit in type "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4486">함수 호출 결과의 크기가 피연산자의 유형을 오버플로합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4486">The magnitude of the result of the function call overflows the type of the operand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4487">더 큰 유형으로 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4487">An explicit cast to a larger type may be required.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4488">0xC0047080</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4488">0xC0047080</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4489">-1073450880</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4489">-1073450880</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4490">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYTYPEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4490">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYTYPEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4491">이항 연산자 "%3"에서 "%1" 및 "%2" 데이터 형식이 호환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4491">The data types "%1" and "%2" are incompatible for binary operator "%3".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4492">피연산자 유형을 이 연산에 호환되는 유형으로 암시적으로 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4492">The operand types could not be implicitly cast into compatible types for the operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4493">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 하나 또는 두 개의 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4493">To perform this operation, one or both operands need to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4494">0xC0047081</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4494">0xC0047081</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4495">-1073450879</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4495">-1073450879</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4496">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDBINARYTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4496">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDBINARYTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4497">데이터 형식 "%1"은(는) 이항 연산자 "%2"과(와) 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4497">The data type "%1" cannot be used with binary operator "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4498">하나 또는 두 개의 피연산자의 유형이 연산에 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4498">The type of one or both of the operands is not supported for the operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4499">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 하나 또는 두 개의 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4499">To perform this operation, one or both operands need to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4500">0xC0047082</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4500">0xC0047082</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4501">-1073450878</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4501">-1073450878</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4502">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYSIGNMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4502">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYSIGNMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4503">"%2" 연산의 비트 이항 연산자 "%1"에서 부호가 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4503">There is a sign mismatch for the bitwise binary operator "%1" in operation "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4504">이 연산자의 두 피연산자는 모두 양수이거나 음수여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4504">Both operands for this operator must be positive or negative.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4505">0xC0047083</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4505">0xC0047083</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4506">-1073450877</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4506">-1073450877</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4507">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPERATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4507">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPERATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4508">이항 연산 "%1"이(가) 실패했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4508">The binary operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4509">내부 오류가 발생했거나 메모리가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4509">An internal error occurred, or an out-of-memory condition exists.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4510">0xC0047084</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4510">0xC0047084</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4511">-1073450876</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4511">-1073450876</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4512">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPERATIONSETTYPEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4512">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPERATIONSETTYPEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4513">이항 연산 "%1"의 결과 유형을 설정하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4513">Attempt to set the result type of binary operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4514">0xC0047085</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4514">0xC0047085</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4515">-1073450875</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4515">-1073450875</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4516">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTRINGCOMPARISONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4516">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTRINGCOMPARISONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4517">"%2"을(를) 문자열 "%1"과(와) 비교하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4517">Comparing "%1" to string "%2" failed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4518">0xC0047086</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4518">0xC0047086</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4519">-1073450874</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4519">-1073450874</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4520">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDUNNARYTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4520">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDUNNARYTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4521">데이터 형식 "%1"을(를) 단항 연산자 "%2"과(와) 함께 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4521">The data type "%1" cannot be used with unary operator "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4522">이 피연산자 유형은 연산에 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4522">This operand type is not supported for the operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4523">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4523">To perform this operation, the operand needs to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4524">0xC0047087</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4524">0xC0047087</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4525">-1073450873</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4525">-1073450873</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4526">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNARYOPERATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4526">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNARYOPERATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4527">단항 연산 "%1"이(가) 실패했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4527">The unary operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4528">내부 오류가 발생했거나 메모리가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4528">An internal error occurred, or there is an out-of-memory condition.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4529">0xC0047088</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4529">0xC0047088</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4530">-1073450872</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4530">-1073450872</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4531">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNARYOPERATIONSETTYPEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4531">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNARYOPERATIONSETTYPEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4532">단항 연산 "%1"의 결과 유형을 설정하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4532">Attempt to set the result type of unary operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4533">0xC0047089</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4533">0xC0047089</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4534">-1073450871</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4534">-1073450871</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4535">DTS_E_EXPREVALPARAMTYPEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4535">DTS_E_EXPREVALPARAMTYPEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4536">함수 "%1"은(는) 매개 변수 번호 %3!d!에 대한 데이터 형식 "%2"을(를) 지원하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4536">The function "%1" does not support the data type "%2" for parameter number %3!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4537">매개 변수의 유형을 이 함수와 호환되는 유형으로 암시적으로 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4537">The type of the parameter could not be implicitly cast into a compatible type for the function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4538">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4538">To perform this operation, the operand needs to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4539">0xC004708A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4539">0xC004708A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4540">-1073450870</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4540">-1073450870</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4541">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDFUNCTION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4541">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDFUNCTION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4542">함수 "%1"이(가) 인식되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4542">The function "%1" was not recognized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4543">함수 이름이 잘못되었거나 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4543">Either the function name is incorrect or does not exist.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4544">0xC004708B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4544">0xC004708B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4545">-1073450869</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4545">-1073450869</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4546">DTS_E_EXPREVALFNSUBSTRINGINVALIDLENGTH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4546">DTS_E_EXPREVALFNSUBSTRINGINVALIDLENGTH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4547">길이 %1!d!이(가) 함수 "%2"에 적합하지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4547">The length %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4548">않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4548">is not valid for function "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4549">길이 매개 변수는 음수일 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4549">The length parameter cannot be negative.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4550">길이 매개 변수를 0이나 양수 값으로 변경하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4550">Change the length parameter to zero or a positive value.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4551">0xC004708C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4551">0xC004708C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4552">-1073450868</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4552">-1073450868</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4553">DTS_E_EXPREVALFNSUBSTRINGINVALIDSTARTINDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4553">DTS_E_EXPREVALFNSUBSTRINGINVALIDSTARTINDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4554">시작 인덱스 %1!d!이(가) 함수 "%2"에 적합하지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4554">The start index %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4555">않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4555">is not valid for function "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4556">시작 인덱스 값은 0보다 큰 정수여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4556">The start index value must be an integer greater than 0.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4557">시작 인덱스는 0이 아닌 1부터 시작합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4557">Start index is one-based, not zero-based.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4558">0xC004708E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4558">0xC004708E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4559">-1073450866</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4559">-1073450866</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4560">DTS_E_EXPREVALCHARMAPPINGFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4560">DTS_E_EXPREVALCHARMAPPINGFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4561">함수 "%1"이(가) 문자열 "%2"에서 문자 매핑을 수행할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4561">The function "%1" cannot perform the character mapping on string "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4562">0xC004708F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4562">0xC004708F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4563">-1073450865</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4563">-1073450865</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4564">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDDATEPART</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4564">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDDATEPART</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4565">"%1"이(가) 함수 "%2"의 유효한 날짜 부분이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4565">"%1" is not a valid date part for function "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4566">0xC0047090</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4566">0xC0047090</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4567">-1073450864</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4567">-1073450864</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4568">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDNULLPARAM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4568">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDNULLPARAM</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4569">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4569">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4570">잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4570">of the function NULL with data type "%2" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4571">NULL()의 매개 변수는 정적이어야 하며 입력 열과 같은 동적 요소를 포함할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4571">The parameters of NULL() must be static, and cannot contain dynamic elements such as input columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4572">0xC0047091</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4572">0xC0047091</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4573">-1073450863</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4573">-1073450863</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4574">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDNULLPARAMTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4574">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDNULLPARAMTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4575">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4575">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4576">아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4576">of the function NULL with data type "%2" is not an integer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4577">NULL()의 매개 변수는 정수이거나 정수로 변환할 수 있는 유형이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4577">A parameter of NULL() must be an integer or a type that can be converted to an integer.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4578">0xC0047092</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4578">0xC0047092</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4579">-1073450862</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4579">-1073450862</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4580">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONPARAMNOTSTATIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4580">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONPARAMNOTSTATIC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4581">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4581">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4582">아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4582">of the function "%2" is not static.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4583">이 매개 변수는 정적이어야 하며 입력 열과 같은 동적 요소를 포함할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4583">This parameter must be static, and cannot contain dynamic elements such as input columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4584">0xC0047093</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4584">0xC0047093</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4585">-1073450861</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4585">-1073450861</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4586">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPARAM</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4586">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPARAM</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4587">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4587">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4588">잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4588">of the cast to data type "%2" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4589">캐스트 연산자의 매개 변수는 정적이어야 하며 입력 열과 같은 동적 요소를 포함할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4589">The parameters of cast operators must be static, and cannot contain dynamic elements such as input columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4590">0xC0047094</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4590">0xC0047094</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4591">-1073450860</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4591">-1073450860</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4592">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPARAMTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4592">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPARAMTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4593">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4593">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4594">아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4594">of the cast to data type "%2" is not an integer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4595">캐스트 연산자의 매개 변수는 정수이거나 정수로 변환할 수 있는 유형이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4595">A parameter of a cast operator must be an integer or a type that can be converted to an integer.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4596">0xC0047095</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4596">0xC0047095</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4597">-1073450859</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4597">-1073450859</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4598">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCAST</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4598">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCAST</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4599">식 "%1"을(를) 데이터 형식 "%2"에서 데이터 형식 "%3"(으)로 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4599">Cannot cast expression "%1" from data type "%2" to data type "%3".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4600">요청된 캐스트가 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4600">The requested cast is not supported.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4601">0xC0047096</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4601">0xC0047096</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4602">-1073450858</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4602">-1073450858</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4603">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDTOKEN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4603">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDTOKEN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4604">식 "%1"을(를) 구문 분석하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4604">Attempt to parse the expression "%1" failed.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4605">줄 번호 "%3", 문자 번호 "%4"의 토큰 "%2"이(가) 인식되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4605">The token "%2" at line number "%3", character number "%4" was not recognized.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4606">이 식은 지정된 위치에 잘못된 요소를 포함하므로 구문 분석할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4606">The expression cannot be parsed because it contains invalid elements at the location specified.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4607">0xC0047097</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4607">0xC0047097</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4608">-1073450857</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4608">-1073450857</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4609">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNEXPECTEDPARSEERROR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4609">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNEXPECTEDPARSEERROR</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4610">식 "%1"을(를) 구문 분석하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4610">An error occurred when parsing the expression "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4611">알 수 없는 이유로 인해 이 식을 구문 분석하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4611">The expression failed to parse for an unknown reason.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4612">0xC0047098</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4612">0xC0047098</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4613">-1073450856</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4613">-1073450856</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4614">DTS_E_EXPREVALFAILEDTOPARSEEXPRESSIONWITHHR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4614">DTS_E_EXPREVALFAILEDTOPARSEEXPRESSIONWITHHR</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4615">식 "%1"을(를) 구문 분석하지 못했으며 오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!이(가) 반환되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4615">Attempt to parse the expression "%1" failed and returned error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4616">이 식은 구문 분석할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4616">The expression cannot be parsed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4617">이 식은 잘못된 요소를 포함하거나 형식이 잘못되었을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4617">It might contain invalid elements or it might not be well-formed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4618">또한 메모리가 부족할 수도 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4618">There may also be an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4619">0xC0047099</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4619">0xC0047099</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4620">-1073450855</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4620">-1073450855</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4621">DTS_E_EXPREVALFAILEDTOPARSEEXPRESSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4621">DTS_E_EXPREVALFAILEDTOPARSEEXPRESSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4622">식 "%1"이(가) 잘못되었으며 구문 분석할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4622">The expression "%1" is not valid and cannot be parsed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4623">식에 잘못된 요소가 있거나 식의 형식이 잘못되었을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4623">The expression may contain invalid elements or it may not be well-formed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4624">0xC004709A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4624">0xC004709A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4625">-1073450854</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4625">-1073450854</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4626">DTS_E_EXPREVALEXPRESSIONEMPTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4626">DTS_E_EXPREVALEXPRESSIONEMPTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4627">컴퓨팅할 식이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4627">There was no expression to compute.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4628">빈 식의 문자열을 컴퓨팅하거나 가져오려고 했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4628">An attempt was made to compute or get the string of an empty expression.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4629">0xC004709B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4629">0xC004709B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4630">-1073450853</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4630">-1073450853</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4631">DTS_E_EXPREVALCOMPUTEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4631">DTS_E_EXPREVALCOMPUTEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4632">식 "%1"을(를) 컴퓨팅하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4632">Attempt to compute the expression "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4633">0xC004709C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4633">0xC004709C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4634">-1073450852</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4634">-1073450852</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4635">DTS_E_EXPREVALBUILDSTRINGFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4635">DTS_E_EXPREVALBUILDSTRINGFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4636">식의 문자열 표현을 생성하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%1!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4636">Attempt to generate a string representation of the expression failed with error code 0x%1!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4637">식을 나타내는 표시 가능한 문자열을 생성하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4637">Failed when attempting to generate a displayable string that represents the expression.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4638">0xC004709D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4638">0xC004709D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4639">-1073450851</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4639">-1073450851</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4640">DTS_E_EXPREVALCANNOTCONVERTRESULT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4640">DTS_E_EXPREVALCANNOTCONVERTRESULT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4641">식 결과 데이터 형식 "%1"을(를) 열 데이터 형식 "%2"(으)로 변환할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4641">Cannot convert the expression result data type "%1" to the column data type "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4642">식 결과를 입/출력 열에 기록해야 하지만 식의 데이터 형식을 열의 데이터 형식으로 변환할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4642">The result of the expression should be written to an input/output column, but the data type of the expression cannot be converted to the data type of the column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4643">0xC004709E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4643">0xC004709E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4644">-1073450850</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4644">-1073450850</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4645">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPINVALIDCONDITIONTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4645">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPINVALIDCONDITIONTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4646">조건부 연산자의 조건 식 "%1"에 잘못된 데이터 형식 "%2"이(가) 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4646">The conditional expression "%1" of the conditional operator has an invalid data type of "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4647">조건부 연산자의 조건 식은 DT_BOOL 유형의 부울을 반환해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4647">The conditional expression of the conditional operator must return a Boolean, which is type DT_BOOL.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4648">0xC004709F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4648">0xC004709F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4649">-1073450849</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4649">-1073450849</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4650">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPTYPEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4650">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPTYPEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4651">데이터 형식 "%1" 및 "%2"은(는) 조건부 연산자와 호환되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4651">The data types "%1" and "%2" are incompatible for the conditional operator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4652">피연산자 유형을 이 조건부 연산에 호환되는 유형으로 암시적으로 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4652">The operand types cannot be implicitly cast into compatible types for the conditional operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4653">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 하나 또는 두 개의 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4653">To perform this operation, one or both operands need to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4654">0xC00470A0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4654">0xC00470A0</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4655">-1073450848</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4655">-1073450848</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4656">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPSETTYPEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4656">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPSETTYPEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4657">조건부 연산 "%1"의 결과 유형을 설정하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4657">Attempt to set the result type of conditional operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4658">0xC00470A1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4658">0xC00470A1</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4659">-1073450847</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4659">-1073450847</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4660">DTS_E_BUFFERORPHANED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4660">DTS_E_BUFFERORPHANED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4661">이 버퍼는 분리되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4661">This buffer has been orphaned.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4662">처리 중인 버퍼를 그대로 둔 상태에서 버퍼 관리자가 종료되었으며 해당 버퍼에 대한 정리가 수행되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4662">The buffer manager has shut down, leaving an outstanding buffer and no cleanup will occur for the buffer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4663">메모리 손실이나 기타 문제가 존재할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4663">There is a potential for memory leaks and other problems.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4664">0xC00470A2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4664">0xC00470A2</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4665">-1073450846</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4665">-1073450846</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4666">DTS_E_EXPREVALINPUTCOLUMNNAMENOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4666">DTS_E_EXPREVALINPUTCOLUMNNAMENOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4667">"%1"(이)라는 입력 열을 찾지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4667">Attempt to find the input column named "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4668">지정한 입력 열을 입력 열 컬렉션에서 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4668">The input column specified was not found in the input column collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4669">0xC00470A3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4669">0xC00470A3</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4670">-1073450845</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4670">-1073450845</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4671">DTS_E_EXPREVALINPUTCOLUMNIDNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4671">DTS_E_EXPREVALINPUTCOLUMNIDNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4672">계보 ID가 %1!d!인 입력 열을 찾지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4672">Attempt to find the input column with lineage ID %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4673">못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4673">failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4674">해당 입력 열을 입력 열 컬렉션에서 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4674">The input column was not found in the input column collection.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4675">0xC00470A4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4675">0xC00470A4</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4676">-1073450844</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4676">-1073450844</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4677">DTS_E_EXPREVALNOINPUTCOLUMNCOLLECTIONFORCOLUMNNAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4677">DTS_E_EXPREVALNOINPUTCOLUMNCOLLECTIONFORCOLUMNNAME</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4678">인식할 수 없는 토큰 "%1"이(가) 식에 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4678">The expression contains unrecognized token "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4679">"%1"이(가) 변수인 경우 "\@%1"(으)로 표현해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4679">If "%1" is a variable, it should be expressed as "\@%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4680">지정한 토큰이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4680">The specified token is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4681">토큰을 변수 이름으로 사용하려면 \@ 기호가 접두사로 와야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4681">If the token is intended to be a variable name, it should be prefixed with the \@ symbol.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4682">0xC00470A5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4682">0xC00470A5</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4683">-1073450843</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4683">-1073450843</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4684">DTS_E_EXPREVALNOINPUTCOLUMNCOLLECTIONFORCOLUMNID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4684">DTS_E_EXPREVALNOINPUTCOLUMNCOLLECTIONFORCOLUMNID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4685">인식할 수 없는 토큰 "#%1!d!"이(가) 식에 포함되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4685">The expression contains unrecognized token "#%1!d!".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4686">0xC00470A6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4686">0xC00470A6</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4687">-1073450842</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4687">-1073450842</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4688">DTS_E_EXPREVALVARIABLENOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4688">DTS_E_EXPREVALVARIABLENOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4689">변수 "%1"을(를) Variables 컬렉션에서 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4689">The variable "%1" was not found in the Variables collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4690">이 변수가 범위를 벗어났을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4690">The variable might not exist in the correct scope.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4691">0xC00470A7</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4691">0xC00470A7</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4692">-1073450841</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4692">-1073450841</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4693">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDTOKENSTATE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4693">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDTOKENSTATE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4694">식 "%1"을(를) 구문 분석하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4694">Attempt to parse the expression "%1" failed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4695">이 식은 잘못된 토큰, 불완전한 토큰 또는 잘못된 요소가 있거나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4695">The expression might contain an invalid token, an incomplete token, or an invalid element.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4696">형식이 잘못되었거나 괄호 같은 필수 요소의 일부가 없을 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4696">It might not be well-formed, or might be missing part of a required element such as a parenthesis.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4697">0xC00470A8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4697">0xC00470A8</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4698">-1073450840</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4698">-1073450840</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4699">DTS_E_BLANKOUTPUTCOLUMNNAME</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4699">DTS_E_BLANKOUTPUTCOLUMNNAME</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4700">"%1"의 이름이 비어 있습니다. 이름은 비워둘 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4700">The name for "%1" is blank, and names cannot be blank.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4701">0xC00470A9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4701">0xC00470A9</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4702">-1073450839</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4702">-1073450839</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4703">DTS_E_HASSIDEEFFECTSWITHSYNCINP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4703">DTS_E_HASSIDEEFFECTSWITHSYNCINP</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4704">"%1"에서 HasSideEffects 속성이 TRUE로 설정되어 있으나 "%1"은(는) 동기화되었으며 다른 작업을 할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4704">The "%1" has the HasSideEffects property set to TRUE, but "%1" is synchronous and cannot have side effects.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4705">HasSideEffects 속성을 FALSE로 설정하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4705">Set the HasSideEffects property to FALSE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4706">0xC00470AA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4706">0xC00470AA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4707">-1073450838</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4707">-1073450838</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4708">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTCODEPAGE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4708">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTCODEPAGE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4709">데이터 형식 "%2"(으)로 캐스팅하는 코드 페이지 매개 변수에 지정한 값 %1!d!이(가) 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4709">The value, %1!d!, specified for the code page parameter of the cast to data type "%2", is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4710">코드 페이지가 시스템에 설치되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4710">The code page is not installed on the machine.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4711">0xC00470AB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4711">0xC00470AB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4712">-1073450837</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4712">-1073450837</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4713">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPRECISION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4713">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTPRECISION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4714">값 %1!d!이(가) 유효한 액세스 모드로 인식되지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4714">The value %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4715">잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4715">specified for the precision parameter of the cast to data type "%2" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4716">전체 자릿수가 %3!d!에서 %4!d! 사이의 범위 내에 있어야</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4716">Precision must be in the range %3!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4717">하는데</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4717">to %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4718">전체 자릿수 값이 형식 캐스팅의 범위를 벗어났습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4718">and the precision value is out of range for the type cast.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4719">0xC00470AC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4719">0xC00470AC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4720">-1073450836</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4720">-1073450836</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4721">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTSCALE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4721">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDCASTSCALE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4722">값 %1!d!이(가) 유효한 액세스 모드로 인식되지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4722">The value %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4723">잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4723">specified for the scale parameter of the cast to data type "%2" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4724">소수 자릿수가 %3!d!에서 %4!d! 사이의 범위 내에 있어야</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4724">The scale must be in the range %3!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4725">하는데</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4725">to %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4726">소수 자릿수 값이 형식 캐스팅의 범위를 벗어났습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4726">and the scale value is out of range for the type cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4727">소수 자릿수는 전체 자릿수를 초과할 수 없으며 양수여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4727">Scale must not exceed precision and must be positive.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4728">0xC00470AD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4728">0xC00470AD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4729">-1073450835</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4729">-1073450835</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4730">DTS_E_NONSORTEDOUTPUTHASSORTKEYPOSITIONS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4730">DTS_E_NONSORTEDOUTPUTHASSORTKEYPOSITIONS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4731">"%1"의 IsSorted 속성이 false이지만 해당 출력 열의 SortKeyPositions의 %2!lu!이(가) 0이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4731">The IsSorted property for "%1" is false, but %2!lu!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4732">아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4732">of its output columns' SortKeyPositions are non-zero.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4733">0xC00470AF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4733">0xC00470AF</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4734">-1073450833</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4734">-1073450833</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4735">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPCODEPAGEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4735">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPCODEPAGEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4736">%2 유형에 대한 조건부 연산 "%1"의 피연산자에 대해 코드 페이지가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4736">The code pages must match for operands of conditional operation "%1" for type %2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4737">왼쪽 피연산자의 코드 페이지가 오른쪽 피연산자의 코드 페이지와 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4737">The code page of the left operand does not match the code page of the right operand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4738">지정한 유형에 대한 조건부 연산자의 경우 코드 페이지가 동일해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4738">For the conditional operator on the specified type, the code pages must be the same.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4739">0xC00470B1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4739">0xC00470B1</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4740">-1073450831</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4740">-1073450831</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4741">DTS_E_REFERENCEDMETADATABADCOUNT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4741">DTS_E_REFERENCEDMETADATABADCOUNT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4742">입력 "%1"(%2!d!)이(가) 입력 "%3"(%4!d!)을(를) 참조하지만 두 입력의 열 수가 동일하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4742">Input "%1" (%2!d!) references input "%3" (%4!d!), but they do not have the same number of columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4743">입력 %5!d!에는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4743">Input %5!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4744">%6!d!개의 열이 있고</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4744">has %6!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4745">입력 %7!d!에는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4745">columns, while input %7!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4746">%8!d!개의 열이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4746">has %8!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4747">있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4747">columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4748">0xC00470B2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4748">0xC00470B2</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4749">-1073450830</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4749">-1073450830</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4750">DTS_E_OBJECTLINEAGEIDNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4750">DTS_E_OBJECTLINEAGEIDNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4751">계보 ID가 %1!d!인 개체가 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4751">No object exists with a lineage ID of %1!d!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4752">0xC00470B3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4752">0xC00470B3</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4753">-1073450829</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4753">-1073450829</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4754">DTS_E_FILENAMEOUTPUTCOLUMNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4754">DTS_E_FILENAMEOUTPUTCOLUMNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4755">파일 이름에 대한 출력 열을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4755">The output column for the file name cannot be found.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4756">0xC00470B4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4756">0xC00470B4</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4757">-1073450828</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4757">-1073450828</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4758">DTS_E_FILENAMEOUTPUTCOLUMNINVALIDDATATYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4758">DTS_E_FILENAMEOUTPUTCOLUMNINVALIDDATATYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4759">파일 이름에 대한 출력 열이 Null로 끝나는 유니코드 문자열(DT_WSTR)이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4759">The output column for the file name is not a null-terminated Unicode character string, which is data type DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4760">0xC00470B5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4760">0xC00470B5</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4761">-1073450827</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4761">-1073450827</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4762">DTS_E_DISTRIBUTORADDFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4762">DTS_E_DISTRIBUTORADDFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4763">오류 0x%2!8.8X!(으)로 인해 배포자가 버퍼를 스레드 "%1"에 제공하지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4763">A distributor failed to give a buffer to thread "%1" because of error 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4764">대상 스레드가 종료 중인 것 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4764">The target thread is probably shutting down.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4765">0xC00470B6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4765">0xC00470B6</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4766">-1073450826</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4766">-1073450826</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4767">DTS_E_LOCALENOTINSTALLED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4767">DTS_E_LOCALENOTINSTALLED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4768">LocaleID %1!ld!이(가) 이 시스템에 설치되지</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4768">The LocaleID %1!ld!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4769">않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4769">is not installed on this system.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4770">0xC00470B7</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4770">0xC00470B7</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4771">-1073450825</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4771">-1073450825</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4772">DTS_E_EXPREVALILLEGALHEXESCAPEINSTRINGLITERAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4772">DTS_E_EXPREVALILLEGALHEXESCAPEINSTRINGLITERAL</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4773">문자열 리터럴 "%1"에 잘못된 16진수 이스케이프 시퀀스 "\x%2"이(가) 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4773">The string literal "%1" contains an illegal hexadecimal escape sequence of  "\x%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4774">이 이스케이프 시퀀스는 식 계산기의 문자열 리터럴에서 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4774">The escape sequence is not supported in string literals in the expression evaluator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4775">16진수 이스케이프 시퀀스의 형식은 \xhhhh여야 하며, 여기서 h는 유효한 16진수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4775">The hexadecimal escape sequences must be of the form \xhhhh where h is a valid hexadecimal digit.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4776">0xC00470B8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4776">0xC00470B8</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4777">-1073450824</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4777">-1073450824</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4778">DTS_E_EXPREVALILLEGALESCAPEINSTRINGLITERAL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4778">DTS_E_EXPREVALILLEGALESCAPEINSTRINGLITERAL</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4779">문자열 리터럴 "%1"에 잘못된 이스케이프 시퀀스 "\\%2!c!"이(가) 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4779">The string literal "%1" contains an illegal escape sequence of "\\%2!c!".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4780">이 이스케이프 시퀀스는 식 계산기의 문자열 리터럴에서 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4780">The escape sequence is not supported in string literals in the expression evaluator.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4781">문자열에 백슬래시가 필요한 경우 이중 백슬래시 "\\\\"를 사용하세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4781">If a backslash is needed in the string, use a double backslash, "\\\\".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4782">0xC00470B9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4782">0xC00470B9</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4783">-1073450823</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4783">-1073450823</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4784">DTS_E_NOOUTPUTCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4784">DTS_E_NOOUTPUTCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4785">"%1"에 출력 열이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4785">"%1" contains no output columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4786">비동기 출력은 출력 열을 포함해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4786">An asynchronous output must contain output columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4787">0xC00470BA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4787">0xC00470BA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4788">-1073450822</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4788">-1073450822</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4789">DTS_E_LOBDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4789">DTS_E_LOBDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4790">"%1"에 지원되지 않는 Long 개체 데이터 형식인 DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT 또는 DT_IMAGE가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4790">The "%1" has a long object data type of DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT, or DT_IMAGE, which is not supported.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4791">0xC00470BB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4791">0xC00470BB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4792">-1073450821</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4792">-1073450821</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4793">DTS_E_OUTPUTWITHMULTIPLEERRORS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4793">DTS_E_OUTPUTWITHMULTIPLEERRORS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4794">출력 ID %1!d!에 여러 오류 출력 구성이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4794">Output ID %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4795">제공되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4795">was given multiple error output configurations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4796">첫 번째는 %2!d! 및 %3!d!이며 그 다음은</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4796">First %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4797">%4!d!입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4797">and %3!d!, then %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4798">%5!d!입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4798">and %5!d!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4799">0xC00470BC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4799">0xC00470BC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4800">-1073450820</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4800">-1073450820</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4801">DTS_E_FAILEDDURINGOLEDBDATATYPECONVERSIONCHECK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4801">DTS_E_FAILEDDURINGOLEDBDATATYPECONVERSIONCHECK</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4802">"%1"에 대한 데이터 형식 변환 확인 중에 OLE DB 공급자가 실패했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4802">The OLE DB provider failed during the data type conversion verification for "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4803">0xC00470BD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4803">0xC00470BD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4804">-1073450819</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4804">-1073450819</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4805">DTS_E_BUFFERISEOR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4805">DTS_E_BUFFERISEOR</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4806">이 버퍼는 행 집합의 끝을 나타내며 행 수를 변경할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4806">This buffer represents the end of the rowset and its row count cannot be altered.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4807">행 집합 플래그의 끝을 포함하는 버퍼에서 AddRow 또는 RemoveRow를 호출하려고 했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4807">An attempt was made to call AddRow or RemoveRow on a buffer that has the end of rowset flag.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4808">0xC00470BE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4808">0xC00470BE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4809">-1073450818</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4809">-1073450818</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4810">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4810">DTS_E_EXPREVALUNSUPPORTEDTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4811">데이터 형식 "%1"은(는) 식에서 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4811">The data type "%1" is not supported in an expression.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4812">지정한 형식이 지원되지 않거나 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4812">The specified type is not supported or is not valid.</span></span>|
