|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4835">0xC00470C3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4835">0xC00470C3</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4836">-1073450813</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4836">-1073450813</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4837">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPERATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4837">DTS_E_EXPREVALCONDITIONALOPERATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4838">조건부 연산 "%1"이(가) 실패했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4838">The conditional operation "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4839">내부 오류나 메모리 부족 오류가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4839">There was an internal error or an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4840">0xC00470C4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4840">0xC00470C4</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4841">-1073450812</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4841">-1073450812</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4842">DTS_E_EXPREVALCASTFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4842">DTS_E_EXPREVALCASTFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4843">데이터 형식 "%2"에서 데이터 형식 "%3"(으)로 식 "%1"을(를) 캐스팅하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%4!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4843">Casting expression "%1" from data type "%2" to data type "%3" failed with error code 0x%4!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4844">0xC00470C5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4844">0xC00470C5</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4845">-1073450811</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4845">-1073450811</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4846">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4846">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4847">함수 "%1"을(를) 계산하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4847">Evaluating function "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4848">0xC00470C6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4848">0xC00470C6</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4849">-1073450810</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4849">-1073450810</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4850">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONCONVERTPARAMTOMEMBERFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4850">DTS_E_EXPREVALFUNCTIONCONVERTPARAMTOMEMBERFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4851">데이터 형식이 "%2"인 함수 NULL의 매개 변수 번호 %1!d!이(가) 정수가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4851">Parameter number %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4852">없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4852">of the function "%2" cannot be converted to a static value.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4967">0xC00470E6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4967">0xC00470E6</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4968">-1073450778</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4968">-1073450778</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4969">DTS_E_EXPREVALPLACEHOLDERINEXPRESSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4969">DTS_E_EXPREVALPLACEHOLDERINEXPRESSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4970">자리 표시자 "%1"이(가) 식에서 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4970">The placeholder "%1" was found in an expression.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4971">이 자리 표시자를 실제 매개 변수나 피연산자로 바꾸어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4971">This must be replaced with an actual parameter or operand.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4988">0xC00470EC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4988">0xC00470EC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4989">-1073450772</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4989">-1073450772</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4990">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPDTSTRNOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4990">DTS_E_EXPREVALBINARYOPDTSTRNOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-4991">이항 연산의 피연산자의 경우 입력 열과 캐스트 연산에 대해서만 데이터 형식 DT_STR이 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4991">For operands of a binary operation, the data type DT_STR is supported only for input columns and cast operations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4992">식 "%1"은(는) 입력 열 또는 캐스트 결과가 아닌 DT_STR 피연산자가 있으므로 이항 연산에 사용할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4992">The expression "%1" has a DT_STR operand that is not an input column or the result of a cast, and cannot be used in a binary operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-4993">이 연산을 수행하려면 캐스트 연산자를 사용하여 피연산자를 명시적으로 캐스팅해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-4993">To perform this operation, the operand needs to be explicitly cast with a cast operator.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5010">0xC00470F0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5010">0xC00470F0</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5011">-1073450768</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5011">-1073450768</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5012">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDDATEPARTNODE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5012">DTS_E_EXPREVALINVALIDDATEPARTNODE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5013">함수 "%1"에 지정한 날짜 부분 매개 변수가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5013">The date part parameter specified for function "%1" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-5014">이 매개 변수는 정적 문자열이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5014">It must be a static string.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-5015">날짜 부분 매개 변수는 입력 열 같은 동적 요소를 포함할 수 없으며 DT_WSTR 유형이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5015">The date part parameter cannot contain dynamic elements, such as input columns, and must be of type DT_WSTR.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5466">0xC004905B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5466">0xC004905B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5467">-1073442725</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5467">-1073442725</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5468">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTATIC_INVALIDCASTSCALE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5468">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTATIC_INVALIDCASTSCALE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5469">캐스트 연산의 소수 자릿수 매개 변수에 지정한 값이 유형 캐스트에 대한 범위를 벗어났습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5469">The value specified for the scale parameter of a cast operation is out of range for the type cast.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-5470">소수 자릿수는 전체 자릿수를 초과할 수 없으며 음수가 아니어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5470">Scale must not exceed precision and must not be negative.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5471">0xC004905C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5471">0xC004905C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5472">-1073442724</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5472">-1073442724</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5473">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTATIC_CONDITIONALOPCODEPAGEMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5473">DTS_E_EXPREVALSTATIC_CONDITIONALOPCODEPAGEMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-5474">조건부 연산에서 코드 페이지가 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5474">The code pages do not match in a conditional operation.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-5475">왼쪽 피연산자의 코드 페이지가 오른쪽 피연산자의 코드 페이지와 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5475">The code page of the left operand does not match the code page of the right operand.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-5476">해당 유형에 대한 조건부 연산자의 경우 코드 페이지가 동일해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-5476">For the conditional operator of that type, the code pages must be the same.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6006">0xC020206B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6006">0xC020206B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6007">-1071636373</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6007">-1071636373</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6008">DTS_E_RAWUNEXPECTEDTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6008">DTS_E_RAWUNEXPECTEDTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6009">어댑터에서 인식할 수 없는 데이터 형식 %1!d!을(를) 발견했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6009">The adapter encountered an unrecognized data type of %1!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6010">이 오류는 손상된 입력 파일(원본) 또는 잘못된 버퍼 유형(대상)으로 인해 발생할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6010">This could be caused by a damaged input file (source) or by an invalid buffer type (destination).</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6020">0xC020206E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6020">0xC020206E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6021">-1071636370</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6021">-1071636370</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6022">DTS_E_RAWSKIPFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6022">DTS_E_RAWSKIPFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6023">원시 어댑터가 계보 ID가 %3!d!인 참조되지 않은 열 "%2"에 대한 입력 열에서 %1!d!바이트를 건너뛰려고 했지만 오류가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6023">The raw adapter attempted to skip %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6024">발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6024">bytes in the input file for unreferenced column "%2" with lineage ID %3!d!, but there was an error.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6025">운영 체제에서 반환된 오류는 이전에 보고되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6025">The error returned from the operating system should have been previously reported.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6422">0xC02020C9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6422">0xC02020C9</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6423">-1071636279</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6423">-1071636279</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6424">DTS_E_FAILEDTOBUFFERROWSTARTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6424">DTS_E_FAILEDTOBUFFERROWSTARTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6425">버퍼 행의 시작을 검색하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%1!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6425">The attempt to retrieve the start of the buffer row failed with error code 0x%1!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6426">0xC02020CA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6426">0xC02020CA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6427">-1071636278</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6427">-1071636278</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6428">DTS_E_BULKINSERTTHREADTERMINATED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6428">DTS_E_BULKINSERTTHREADTERMINATED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6429">SSIS 대량 삽입에 대한 스레드가 더 이상 실행 중이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6429">The thread for the SSIS Bulk Insert is no longer running.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6430">추가 행을 삽입할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6430">No more rows can be inserted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6431">대량 삽입 스레드 제한 시간을 늘리십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6431">Try increasing the bulk insert thread timeout.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6432">0xC02020CB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6432">0xC02020CB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6433">-1071636277</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6433">-1071636277</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6434">DTS_E_RAWTOOMANYCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6434">DTS_E_RAWTOOMANYCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6435">원본 파일이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6435">The source file is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6436">원본 파일에서 131,072개 이상의 열을 반환합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6436">The source file is returning a count of more than 131,072 columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6437">이 오류는 일반적으로 원본 파일이 원시 파일 대상에 의해 생성되지 않을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6437">This usually occurs when the source file is not produced by the raw file destination.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6438">0xC02020CC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6438">0xC02020CC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6439">-1071636276</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6439">-1071636276</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6440">DTS_E_TXUNIONALL_EXTRADANGLINGINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6440">DTS_E_TXUNIONALL_EXTRADANGLINGINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6441">%1은(는) 연결되지 않은 추가 입력이며 제거됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6441">The %1 is an extra unattached input and will be removed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6442">0xC02020CD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6442">0xC02020CD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6443">-1071636275</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6443">-1071636275</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6444">DTS_E_TXUNIONALL_NONDANGLINGUNATTACHEDINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6444">DTS_E_TXUNIONALL_NONDANGLINGUNATTACHEDINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6445">%1은(는) 연결되지 않았는데 현수로 표시되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6445">The %1 is not attached but is not marked as dangling.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6446">현수로 표시되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6446">It will be marked as dangling.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6447">0xC02020CF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6447">0xC02020CF</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6448">-1071636273</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6448">-1071636273</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6449">DTS_E_TXPIVOTRUNTIMEDUPLICATEPIVOTKEYVALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6449">DTS_E_TXPIVOTRUNTIMEDUPLICATEPIVOTKEYVALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6450">피벗 키 값 "%1"이(가) 중복됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6450">Duplicate pivot key value "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6451">0xC02020D0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6451">0xC02020D0</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6452">-1071636272</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6452">-1071636272</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6453">DTS_E_TXPIVOTRUNTIMEDUPLICATEPIVOTKEYVALUENOSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6453">DTS_E_TXPIVOTRUNTIMEDUPLICATEPIVOTKEYVALUENOSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6454">피벗 키 값이 중복됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6454">Duplicate pivot key value.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6455">0xC02020D1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6455">0xC02020D1</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6456">-1071636271</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6456">-1071636271</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6457">DTS_E_FAILEDTOGETCOMPONENTLOCALEID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6457">DTS_E_FAILEDTOGETCOMPONENTLOCALEID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6458">구성 요소 로캘 ID를 검색하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6458">Failure retrieving component locale ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6459">오류 코드는 0x%1!8.8X!입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6459">Error code 0x%1!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6460">0xC02020D2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6460">0xC02020D2</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6461">-1071636270</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6461">-1071636270</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6462">DTS_E_MISMATCHCOMPONENTCONNECTIONMANAGERLOCALEID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6462">DTS_E_MISMATCHCOMPONENTCONNECTIONMANAGERLOCALEID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6463">로캘 ID가 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6463">Mismatched locale IDs.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6464">구성 요소 로캘 ID(%1!d!)가 연결 관리자 로캘 ID(%2!d!)와 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6464">The component locale ID (%1!d!) does not match the connection manager locale ID (%2!d!).</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6465">0xC02020D3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6465">0xC02020D3</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6466">-1071636269</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6466">-1071636269</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6467">DTS_E_LOCALEIDNOTSET</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6467">DTS_E_LOCALEIDNOTSET</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6468">구성 요소 로캘 ID가 설정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6468">The component locale ID has not been set.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6469">플랫 파일 어댑터에는 플랫 파일 연결 관리자 로캘 ID가 설정되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6469">Flat file adapters need to have the locale ID on the flat file connection manager set.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6470">0xC02020D4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6470">0xC02020D4</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6471">-1071636268</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6471">-1071636268</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6472">DTS_E_RAWBYTESTOOLONG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6472">DTS_E_RAWBYTESTOOLONG</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6473">이진 필드가 너무 깁니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6473">The binary field is too large.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6474">어댑터가 %1!d!바이트 길이의 이진 필드를 읽으려고 했지만 오프셋 %3!d!에서 %2!d!보다 짧은</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6474">The adapter attempted to read a binary field that was %1!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6475">필드가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6475">bytes long, but expected a field no longer than %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6476">필요합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6476">bytes at offset %3!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6477">이 오류는 일반적으로 입력 필드가 잘못되었을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6477">This usually occurs when the input file is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6478">파일에 있는 문자열 길이가 너무 커서 버퍼 열에 적합하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6478">The file contains a string length that is too large for the buffer column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6479">0xC02020D5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6479">0xC02020D5</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6480">-1071636267</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6480">-1071636267</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6481">DTS_E_TXSAMPLINGINVALIDPCT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6481">DTS_E_TXSAMPLINGINVALIDPCT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6482">백분율 %2!ld!이(가) "%1" 속성에 적합하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6482">The percentage, %2!ld!, is not valid for the "%1" property.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6483">0부터 100 사이여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6483">It must be between 0 and 100.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6484">0xC02020D6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6484">0xC02020D6</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6485">-1071636266</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6485">-1071636266</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6486">DTS_E_TXSAMPLINGINVALIDROWS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6486">DTS_E_TXSAMPLINGINVALIDROWS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6487">행 수인 %2!ld!이(가) "%1" 속성에 적합하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6487">The number of rows, %2!ld!, is not valid for the "%1" property.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6488">0보다 커야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6488">It must be greater than 0.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6489">0xC02020D7</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6489">0xC02020D7</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6490">-1071636265</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6490">-1071636265</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6491">DTS_E_RAWSTRINGINPUTTOOLONG</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6491">DTS_E_RAWSTRINGINPUTTOOLONG</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6492">어댑터가 %1!I64d!바이트 길이의 문자열을 기록하라는 요청을 받았지만 모든 데이터의 길이는 4294967295바이트보다 작아야</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6492">The adapter was asked to write a string that was %1!I64d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6493">합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6493">bytes long, but all data must be less than 4294967295 bytes in length.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6494">0xC02020D9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6494">0xC02020D9</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6495">-1071636263</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6495">-1071636263</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6496">DTS_E_ATLEASTONEINPUTMUSTBEMAPPEDTOOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6496">DTS_E_ATLEASTONEINPUTMUSTBEMAPPEDTOOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6497">입력이 출력으로 매핑되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6497">No inputs were mapped to an output.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6498">"%1"에는 적어도 하나 이상의 입력 열이 출력 열로 매핑되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6498">The "%1" must have at least one input column mapped to an output column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6499">0xC02020DB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6499">0xC02020DB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6500">-1071636261</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6500">-1071636261</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6501">DTS_E_CANNOTCONVERTDATATYPESWITHDIFFERENTCODEPAGES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6501">DTS_E_CANNOTCONVERTDATATYPESWITHDIFFERENTCODEPAGES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6502">코드 페이지가 %2!d!인 "%1"에서</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6502">Conversion from "%1" with code page %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6503">코드 페이지가 %4!d!인 "%3"(으)로의 변환은</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6503">to "%3" with code page %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6504">은 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6504">is not supported.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6505">0xC02020DC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6505">0xC02020DC</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6506">-1071636260</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6506">-1071636260</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6507">DTS_E_COLUMNNOTMAPPEDTOEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6507">DTS_E_COLUMNNOTMAPPEDTOEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6508">%1에 대한 외부 메타데이터 열 매핑이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6508">The external metadata column mapping for %1 is not valid.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6509">외부 메타데이터 열 ID는 0일 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6509">The external metadata column ID cannot be zero.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6786">0xC0204025</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6786">0xC0204025</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6787">-1071628251</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6787">-1071628251</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6788">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6788">DTS_E_FAILEDTOSETOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6789">"%1"에 데이터 형식 속성을 설정하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6789">Attempt to set the data type properties on "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6790">출력 열의 데이터 형식 속성 중에서 하나 이상을 설정하는 동안 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6790">The error occurred while attempting to set one or more of the data type properties of the output column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6791">0xC0204026</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6791">0xC0204026</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6792">-1071628250</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6792">-1071628250</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6793">DTS_E_UNABLETORETRIEVEMETADATA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6793">DTS_E_UNABLETORETRIEVEMETADATA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6794">"%1"에 대한 메타데이터를 검색할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6794">The metadata for "%1" cannot be retrieved.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6795">개체 이름이 올바른지, 그리고 개체가 있는지 확인하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6795">Make sure the object name is correct and the object exists.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6796">0xC0204027</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6796">0xC0204027</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6797">-1071628249</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6797">-1071628249</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6798">DTS_E_CANNOTMAPOUTPUTCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6798">DTS_E_CANNOTMAPOUTPUTCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6799">출력 열을 외부 메타데이터 열로 매핑할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6799">The output column cannot be mapped to an external metadata column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6800">0xC0204028</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6800">0xC0204028</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6801">-1071628248</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6801">-1071628248</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6802">DTS_E_UNSUPPORTEDVARIABLETYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6802">DTS_E_UNSUPPORTEDVARIABLETYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6803">변수 %1은(는) "%2" 유형이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6803">The variable %1 is required to be of type "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6804">0xC020402A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6804">0xC020402A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6805">-1071628246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6805">-1071628246</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6806">DTS_E_CANTSETEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6806">DTS_E_CANTSETEXTERNALMETADATACOLUMNDATATYPEPROPERTIES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6807">%1에서는 외부 메타데이터 열 데이터 형식 속성을 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6807">The %1 does not allow setting external metadata column datatype properties.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6808">0xC020402B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6808">0xC020402B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6809">-1071628245</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6809">-1071628245</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6810">DTS_E_IDNOTINPUTNOROUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6810">DTS_E_IDNOTINPUTNOROUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6811">ID %1!lu!은(는) 입력 ID 또는 출력 ID가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6811">The ID, %1!lu!, is neither an input ID nor an output ID.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6812">지정한 ID는 외부 메타데이터 컬렉션이 연결된 입력 ID 또는 출력 ID여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6812">The specified ID must be the input ID or the output ID that the external metadata collection is associated with.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6813">0xC020402C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6813">0xC020402C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6814">-1071628244</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6814">-1071628244</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6815">DTS_E_METADATACOLLECTIONNOTUSED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6815">DTS_E_METADATACOLLECTIONNOTUSED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6816">"%1"에서 외부 메타데이터 컬렉션이 사용되지 않은 것으로 표시되어 어떠한 작업도 수행할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6816">The external metadata collection on "%1" is marked as not used, so no operations can be performed on it.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6817">0xC020402D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6817">0xC020402D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6818">-1071628243</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6818">-1071628243</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6819">DTS_E_NOBUFFERTYPEONSYNCOUTPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6819">DTS_E_NOBUFFERTYPEONSYNCOUTPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6820">%1은(는) 동기 출력인데 동기 출력에 필요한 버퍼 유형을 검색할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6820">The %1 is a synchronous output and the buffer type cannot be retrieved for a synchronous output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6821">0xC0207000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6821">0xC0207000</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6822">-1071616000</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6822">-1071616000</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6823">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNUSAGETYPENOTREADONLY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6823">DTS_E_INPUTCOLUMNUSAGETYPENOTREADONLY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6824">입력 열 "%1"은(는) 읽기 전용이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6824">The input column "%1" must be read-only.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6825">입력 열에 읽기 전용이 아닌 허용되지 않는 사용 유형이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6825">The input column has a usage type other than read-only, which is not allowed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6826">0xC0207001</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6826">0xC0207001</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6827">-1071615999</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6827">-1071615999</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6828">DTS_E_MISSINGCUSTOMPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6828">DTS_E_MISSINGCUSTOMPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6829">"%1"에 필수 속성 "%2"이(가) 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6829">The "%1" is missing the required property "%2".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6830">이 개체에는 지정한 사용자 지정 속성이 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6830">The object is required to have the specified custom property.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6831">0xC0207002</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6831">0xC0207002</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6832">-1071615998</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6832">-1071615998</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6833">DTS_E_ILLEGALCUSTOMOUTPUTPROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6833">DTS_E_ILLEGALCUSTOMOUTPUTPROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6834">출력 %1에 속성 "%2"을(를) 할당할 수 없지만 현재 이 속성이 할당되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6834">The output %1 cannot not have property "%2", but currently has that property assigned.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6835">0xC0207003</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6835">0xC0207003</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6836">-1071615997</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6836">-1071615997</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6837">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTEXCLUSIONGROUP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6837">DTS_E_INVALIDOUTPUTEXCLUSIONGROUP</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6838">%1은(는) 제외 그룹 %2!d!에 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6838">The %1 must be in exclusion group %2!d!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6839">모든 출력은 지정한 제외 그룹에 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6839">All outputs must be in the specified exclusion group.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6840">0xC0207004</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6840">0xC0207004</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6841">-1071615996</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6841">-1071615996</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6842">DTS_E_PROPERTYISEMPTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6842">DTS_E_PROPERTYISEMPTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6843">속성 "%1"이(가) 비어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6843">The property "%1" is empty.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6844">이 속성은 비워둘 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6844">The property cannot be empty.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6845">0xC0207005</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6845">0xC0207005</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6846">-1071615995</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6846">-1071615995</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6847">DTS_E_CREATEEXPRESSIONOBJECTFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6847">DTS_E_CREATEEXPRESSIONOBJECTFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6848">식 "%1"에 대해 메모리를 할당할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6848">Memory cannot be allocated for the expression "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6849">식을 보유하기 위한 내부 개체를 만드는 동안 메모리 부족 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6849">There was an out-of-memory error while creating an internal object to hold the expression.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6850">0xC0207006</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6850">0xC0207006</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6851">-1071615994</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6851">-1071615994</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6852">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONPARSEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6852">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONPARSEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6853">식 "%1"을(를) 구문 분석할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6853">Cannot parse the expression "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6854">이 식이 잘못되었거나 메모리가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6854">The expression was not valid, or there is an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6855">0xC0207007</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6855">0xC0207007</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6856">-1071615993</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6856">-1071615993</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6857">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6857">DTS_E_EXPRESSIONCOMPUTEFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6858">식 "%1"을(를) 계산하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6858">Computing the expression "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6859">구문 분석 시에 발견할 수 없는 오류(예: 0으로 나누기)가 이 식에 있거나 메모리가 부족합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6859">The expression may have errors, such as divide by zero, that cannot be detected at parse time, or there may be an out-of-memory error.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6860">0xC0207008</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6860">0xC0207008</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6861">-1071615992</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6861">-1071615992</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6862">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONARRAY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6862">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONARRAY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6863">Expression 개체에 대해 메모리를 할당할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6863">Memory cannot be allocated for the Expression objects.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6864">Expression 개체 포인터의 배열을 만드는 동안 메모리 부족 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6864">An out-of-memory error occurred while creating the array of Expression object pointers.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6865">0xC020700A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6865">0xC020700A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6866">-1071615990</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6866">-1071615990</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6867">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONMANANGER</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6867">DTS_E_FAILEDTOCREATEEXPRESSIONMANANGER</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6868">식 관리자를 만드는 동안 %1이(가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6868">The %1 failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6869">실패했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6869">while creating the Expression Manager.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6870">0xC020700B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6870">0xC020700B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6871">-1071615989</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6871">-1071615989</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6872">DTS_E_SPLITEXPRESSIONNOTBOOLEAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6872">DTS_E_SPLITEXPRESSIONNOTBOOLEAN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6873">식 "%1"이(가) 부울이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6873">The expression "%1" is not Boolean.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6874">이 식의 결과 유형은 부울이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6874">The result type of the expression must be Boolean.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6884">0xC020700F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6884">0xC020700F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6885">-1071615985</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6885">-1071615985</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6886">DTS_E_SETRESULTCOLUMNFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6886">DTS_E_SETRESULTCOLUMNFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-6887">%2에서 식 "%1"의 결과 열을 설정하지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%3!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6887">Attempting to set the result column for the expression "%1" on %2 failed with error code 0x%3!8.8X!.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-6888">식 결과를 받기 위한 입력 또는 출력 열을 확인할 수 없거나 식 결과를 열 유형으로 캐스팅할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-6888">The input or output column that was to receive the result of the expression cannot be determined, or the expression result cannot be cast to the column type.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7039">0xC0208024</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7039">0xC0208024</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7040">-1071611868</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7040">-1071611868</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7041">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONOBJECTTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7041">DTS_E_INCORRECTCONNECTIONOBJECTTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7042">연결 관리자 "%1"이(가) AcquireConnection 메서드에서 잘못된 유형의 개체를 반환했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7042">The connection manager "%1" returned an object of an  incorrect type from the AcquireConnection method.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7058">0xC0208028</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7058">0xC0208028</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7059">-1071611864</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7059">-1071611864</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7060">DTS_E_EXTRACTORDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7060">DTS_E_EXTRACTORDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7061">"%1"에서 "%2"을(를) 참조하지만 해당 열이 BLOB 유형이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7061">The "%1" references "%2", and that column is not of a BLOB type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7062">0xC0208029</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7062">0xC0208029</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7063">-1071611863</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7063">-1071611863</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7064">DTS_E_INSERTERREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7064">DTS_E_INSERTERREFERENCEDCOLUMNNOTFOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7065">"%1"이(가) 출력 열 ID %2!d!을(를) 참조하지만 해당 열을 출력에서 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7065">The "%1" references output column ID %2!d!, and that column is not found on the output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7066">0xC020802A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7066">0xC020802A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7067">-1071611862</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7067">-1071611862</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7068">DTS_E_INSERTERCANTREAD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7068">DTS_E_INSERTERCANTREAD</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7069">파일 "%1"에서 읽지 못했습니다(오류 코드 0x%2!8.8X!).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7069">Reading from the file "%1" failed with error code 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7070">0xC020802B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7070">0xC020802B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7071">-1071611861</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7071">-1071611861</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7072">DTS_E_TXSCD_NOTYPEDCOLUMNSATINPUT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7072">DTS_E_TXSCD_NOTYPEDCOLUMNSATINPUT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7073">느린 변경 차원 변환의 입력에는 고정, 변경 또는 기록 유형의 열이 적어도 하나 이상 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7073">There must be at least one column of Fixed, Changing, or Historical type on the input of a Slowly Changing Dimension transform.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7074">적어도 하나 이상의 열이 FixedAttribute, ChangingAttribute 또는 HistoricalAttribute인지 확인하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7074">Verify that at least one column is a FixedAttribute, ChangingAttribute, or HistoricalAttribute.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7075">0xC020802C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7075">0xC020802C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7076">-1071611860</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7076">-1071611860</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7077">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDINPUTCOLUMNTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7077">DTS_E_TXSCD_INVALIDINPUTCOLUMNTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7078">"%1"의 ColumnType 속성이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7078">The ColumnType property of "%1" is not valid.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7079">현재 값이 허용되는 값 범위를 벗어났습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7079">The current value is outside the range of acceptable values.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7080">0xC020802D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7080">0xC020802D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7081">-1071611859</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7081">-1071611859</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7082">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTMAPDIFFERENTTYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7082">DTS_E_TXSCD_CANNOTMAPDIFFERENTTYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7083">데이터 형식이 다르기 때문에 입력 열 "%1"을(를) 외부 열 "%2"(으)로 매핑할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7083">The input column "%1" cannot be mapped to external column "%2" because they have different data types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7084">느린 변경 차원 변환은 DT_STR 및 DT_WSTR을 제외한 다른 형식의 열 사이에서 매핑을 허용하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7084">The Slowly Changing Dimension transform does not allow mapping between column of different types except for DT_STR and DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7085">0xC020802E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7085">0xC020802E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7086">-1071611858</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7086">-1071611858</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7087">DTS_E_NTEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHANSIFILES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7087">DTS_E_NTEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHANSIFILES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7088">"%1"의 데이터 형식이 ANSI 파일에서 지원되지 않는 DT_NTEXT입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7088">The data type for "%1" is DT_NTEXT, which is not supported with ANSI files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7089">DT_TEXT를 대신 사용하고 데이터 변환 구성 요소를 통해 데이터를 DT_NTEXT로 변환하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7089">Use DT_TEXT instead and convert the data to DT_NTEXT using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7090">0xC020802F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7090">0xC020802F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7091">-1071611857</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7091">-1071611857</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7092">DTS_E_TEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHUNICODEFILES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7092">DTS_E_TEXTDATATYPENOTSUPPORTEDWITHUNICODEFILES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7093">"%1"의 데이터 형식이 유니코드 파일에서 지원되지 않는 DT_TEXT입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7093">The data type for "%1" is DT_TEXT, which is not supported with Unicode files.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7094">DT_NTEXT를 대신 사용하고 데이터 변환 구성 요소를 통해 데이터를 DT_TEXT로 변환하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7094">Use DT_NTEXT instead and convert the data to DT_TEXT using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7095">0xC0208030</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7095">0xC0208030</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7096">-1071611856</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7096">-1071611856</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7097">DTS_E_IMAGEDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7097">DTS_E_IMAGEDATATYPENOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7098">"%1"의 데이터 형식이 지원되지 않는 DT_IMAGE입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7098">The data type for "%1" is DT_IMAGE, which is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7099">DT_TEXT 또는 DT_NTEXT를 대신 사용하고 데이터 변환 구성 요소를 통해 데이터를 DT_IMAGE로 변환하거나 DT_IMAGE에서 변환하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7099">Use DT_TEXT or DT_NTEXT instead and convert the data from, or to, DT_IMAGE using the data conversion component.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7100">0xC0208031</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7100">0xC0208031</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7101">-1071611855</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7101">-1071611855</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7102">DTS_E_FLATFILEFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7102">DTS_E_FLATFILEFORMATNOTSUPPORTED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7103">형식 "%1"은(는) 플랫 파일 연결 관리자에서 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7103">Format "%1" is not supported by Flat File Connection Manager.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7104">지원되는 형식은 Delimited, FixedWidth, RaggedRight 및 Mixed입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7104">Supported formats are Delimited, FixedWidth, RaggedRight, and Mixed.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7105">0xC0208032</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7105">0xC0208032</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7106">-1071611854</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7106">-1071611854</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7107">DTS_E_EXTRACTORFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7107">DTS_E_EXTRACTORFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7108">"%1"이(가) 파일 이름을 포함해야 하는데, 문자열 유형이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7108">The "%1" should contain a file name, but it is not of a String type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7109">0xC0208033</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7109">0xC0208033</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7110">-1071611853</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7110">-1071611853</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7111">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTAPPENDTRUNCATE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7111">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCANTAPPENDTRUNCATE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7112">속성 설정이 충돌하여 오류가 발생했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7112">Error caused by conflicting property settings.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7113">"%1"에는 TRUE로 설정된 AllowAppend 속성과 ForceTruncate 속성이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7113">The "%1" has both the AllowAppend property and the ForceTruncate property set to TRUE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7114">두 속성을 모두 TRUE로 설정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7114">Both properties cannot be set to TRUE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7115">두 속성 중 하나를 FALSE로 설정하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7115">Set one of the two properties to FALSE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7116">0xC0208034</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7116">0xC0208034</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7117">-1071611852</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7117">-1071611852</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7118">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7118">DTS_E_EXTRACTORCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7119">%1에서 열 ID %2!d!을 참조하지만 이미 %3이(가) 해당 열을 참조합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7119">The %1 references column ID %2!d!, but that column is already referenced by %3.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7120">해당 열에 대한 두 참조 중 하나를 제거하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7120">Remove one of the two reference to the column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7121">0xC0208035</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7121">0xC0208035</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7122">-1071611851</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7122">-1071611851</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7123">DTS_E_CONNECTIONMANANGERNOTASSIGNED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7123">DTS_E_CONNECTIONMANANGERNOTASSIGNED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7124">연결 관리자가 %1에 할당되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7124">A connection manager has not been assigned to the %1.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7125">0xC0208036</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7125">0xC0208036</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7126">-1071611850</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7126">-1071611850</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7127">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7127">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNALREADYREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7128">%1에서 ID가 %2!d!인 출력 열을 참조하지만 이미 %3이(가) 해당 열을 참조합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7128">The %1 references the output column with ID %2!d!, but that column is already referenced by %3.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7129">0xC0208037</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7129">0xC0208037</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7130">-1071611849</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7130">-1071611849</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7131">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNNOTREFERENCED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7131">DTS_E_INSERTERCOLUMNNOTREFERENCED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7132">"%1"을(를) 어떠한 입력 열에서도 참조하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7132">The "%1" is not referenced by any input column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7133">정확하게 하나의 입력 열에서 각 출력 열을 참조해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7133">Each output column must be referenced by exactly one input column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7134">0xC0208038</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7134">0xC0208038</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7135">-1071611848</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7135">-1071611848</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7136">DTS_E_INSERTERDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7136">DTS_E_INSERTERDATACOLUMNNOTBLOB</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7137">"%1"에서 "%2"을(를) 참조하지만 해당 열의 유형이 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7137">The "%1" references "%2", and that column is not the correct type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7138">DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT 또는 DT_IMAGE여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7138">It must be DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT, or DT_IMAGE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7139">참조에서 가리키는 열이 BLOB입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7139">A reference points to a column that must be a BLOB.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7140">0xC0208039</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7140">0xC0208039</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7141">-1071611847</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7141">-1071611847</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7142">DTS_E_INSERTERFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7142">DTS_E_INSERTERFILENAMECOLUMNNOTSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7143">"%1"에 파일 이름이 있어야 하지만 문자열 유형이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7143">The "%1" should contain a file name, but it is not a String type.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7144">0xC020803A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7144">0xC020803A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7145">-1071611846</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7145">-1071611846</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7146">DTS_E_INSERTEREXPECTBOMINVALIDTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7146">DTS_E_INSERTEREXPECTBOMINVALIDTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7147">%2에 대해 TRUE로 설정된 ExpectBOM 속성이 "%1"에 있지만 이 열은 NT_NTEXT가 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7147">The "%1" has the ExpectBOM property set to TRUE for %2, but the column is not NT_NTEXT.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7148">ExpectBOM은 열 가져오기 변환의 BOM(바이트 순서 표시) 사용 여부를 지정합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7148">The ExpectBOM specifies that the Import Column transformation expects a byte-order mark (BOM).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7149">ExpectBOM 속성을 false로 설정하거나 출력 열 데이터 형식을 DT_NTEXT로 변경하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7149">Either set the ExpectBOM property to false or change the output column data type to DT_NTEXT.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7150">0xC020803B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7150">0xC020803B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7151">-1071611845</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7151">-1071611845</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7152">DTS_E_INSERTERINVALIDDATACOLUMNSETTYPE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7152">DTS_E_INSERTERINVALIDDATACOLUMNSETTYPE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7153">데이터 출력 열은 DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT 또는 DT_IMAGE여야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7153">Data output columns must be DT_TEXT, DT_NTEXT, or DT_IMAGE.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7154">데이터 출력 열은 BLOB 유형으로만 설정할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7154">The data output column may only be set to a BLOB type.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7731">0xC0208302</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7731">0xC0208302</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7732">-1071611134</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7732">-1071611134</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7733">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNSUPPORTED_MATCH_INDEX_VERSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7734">기존 일치 인덱스 "%2"의 버전(%1)이 지원되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7734">The version (%1) of the pre-existing match index "%2" is not supported.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7735">필요한 버전은 "%3"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7735">The version expected is "%3".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7736">이 오류는 인덱스 메타데이터에 유지된 버전이 현재 코드가 작성된 버전과 일치하지 않는 경우에 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7736">This error occurs if the version persisted in the index metadata does not match the version which the current code was built for.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7737">현재 버전의 코드로 인덱스를 다시 작성하여 오류를 수정하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7737">Fix the error by rebuilding the index with the current version of the code.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7738">0xC0208303</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7738">0xC0208303</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7739">-1071611133</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7739">-1071611133</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7740">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7741">테이블 "%1"이(가) 미리 작성된 올바른 일치 인덱스가 아닌 것 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7741">The table "%1" does not appear to be a valid pre-built match index.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7742">이 오류는 메타데이터 레코드를 지정한 미리 작성된 인덱스에서 로드할 수 없을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7742">This error occurs if the metadata record cannot be loaded from the specified pre-built index.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7743">0xC0208304</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7743">0xC0208304</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7744">-1071611132</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7744">-1071611132</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7745">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLE_TO_READ_MATCH_INDEX</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7746">지정한 미리 작성된 일치 인덱스 "%1"을(를) 읽을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7746">Unable to read specified pre-built match index "%1".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7747">OLEDB 오류 코드: 0x%2!8.8X!.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7747">OLEDB Error code: 0x%2!8.8X!.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7748">0xC0208305</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7748">0xC0208305</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7749">-1071611131</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7749">-1071611131</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7750">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7751">참조 테이블 열에 대한 올바른 조인이 있는 입력 열이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7751">There were no input columns with a valid join to a reference table column.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7752">입력 열 속성 JoinToReferenceColumn 및 JoinType을 사용하여 적어도 하나 이상의 조인을 정의해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7752">Make sure that there is at least one join defined using the input column properties JoinToReferenceColumn and JoinType.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7753">0xC0208306</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7753">0xC0208306</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7754">-1071611130</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7754">-1071611130</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7755">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INDEX_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7756">지정한 기존 일치 인덱스 "%1"이(가) 원래 열 "%2"에 대한 유사 항목 조회 정보로 작성되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7756">The specified pre-existing match index "%1" was not originally built with fuzzy match information for column "%2".</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7757">이 정보를 포함하도록 이 인덱스를 다시 작성해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7757">It must be rebuilt to include this information.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7758">이 오류는 유사 항목 조인 열이 아닌 열로 인덱스를 작성했을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7758">This error occurs when the index was built with the column not being a fuzzy join column.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7759">0xC0208307</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7759">0xC0208307</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7760">-1071611129</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7760">-1071611129</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7761">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_IDENTIFIER_PROPERTY</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7762">속성 "%2"에 지정된 이름 "%1"이(가) 올바른 SQL 식별자 이름이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7762">The name "%1" given for property "%2" is not a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7763">이 오류는 속성의 이름이 올바른 SQL 식별자 이름에 대한 사양을 따르지 않을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7763">This error occurs if the name for the property does not conform to the specifications for a valid SQL identifier name.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7764">0xC0208309</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7764">0xC0208309</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7765">-1071611127</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7765">-1071611127</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7766">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MINSIMILARITY_INVALID</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7767">유사 항목 조회 변환에서 MinSimilarity 임계값 속성은 0.0보다 크거나 같고 1.0보다 작은 값이어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7767">The MinSimilarity threshold property on the Fuzzy Lookup transformation must be a value greater than or equal to 0.0 but less than 1.0.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7768">0xC020830A</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7768">0xC020830A</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7769">-1071611126</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7769">-1071611126</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7770">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INVALID_PROPERTY_VALUE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7771">속성 "%2"에 대한 값 "%1"이(가) 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7771">The value "%1" for property "%2" is not valid.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7772">0xC020830B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7772">0xC020830B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7773">-1071611125</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7773">-1071611125</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7774">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_FUZZY_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7775">유사 항목 조인이 DT_STR 및 DT_WSTR 유형의 문자열 열 사이에서만 지원되므로 입력 열 "%1" 및 참조 열 "%2" 사이에 지정된 유사 항목 조회가 잘못되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7775">The fuzzy lookup specified between input column "%1" and reference column "%2" is not valid because fuzzy joins are only supported between string columns, types DT_STR and DT_WSTR.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7776">0xC020830C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7776">0xC020830C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7777">-1071611124</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7777">-1071611124</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7778">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_EXACT_JOIN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7779">정확히 조회 열 "%1" 및 "%2"의 데이터 형식이 다르거나 비교할 수 있는 문자열 유형이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7779">The exact lookup columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not comparable string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7780">정확히 조인은 동일한 데이터 형식이나 DT_STR 및 DT_WSTR이 조합된 열 사이에서만 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7780">Exact joins are supported between columns with equal data types or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7781">0xC020830D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7781">0xC020830D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7782">-1071611123</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7782">-1071611123</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7783">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_COPYCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7784">복사 열 "%1" 및 "%2"의 데이터 형식이 다르거나 일반적으로 변환할 수 있는 문자열 유형이 아닙니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7784">The copy columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types or are not trivially convertible string types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7785">이 오류는 동일한 데이터 형식이나 DT_STR 및 DT_WSTR이 조합된 열 사이에는 참조에서 출력으로의 복사가 지원되지만 다른 유형의 열에서는 지원되지 않기 때문에 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7785">This occurs because copying from reference to output between columns with equal data types, or a DT_STR and DT_WSTR combination, is supported, but other types are not.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7786">0xC020830E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7786">0xC020830E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7787">-1071611122</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7787">-1071611122</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7788">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_INCOMPATIBLE_PASSTHRUCOLUMN_DATATYPES</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7789">통과 열 "%1" 및 "%2"의 데이터 형식이 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7789">The passthrough columns, "%1" and "%2", do not have equal data types.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7790">데이터 형식이 동일한 열만 입력에서 출력으로의 통과 열로 지원됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7790">Only columns with equal data types are supported as passthrough columns from input to output.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7791">0xC020830F</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7791">0xC020830F</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7792">-1071611121</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7792">-1071611121</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7793">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_UNABLETOLOCATEREFCOLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7794">참조 열 "%1"을(를) 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7794">Cannot locate reference column "%1".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7795">0xC0208311</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7795">0xC0208311</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7796">-1071611119</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7796">-1071611119</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7797">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_OUTPUT_COLUMN_MUST_BE_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_OR_A_COPY_COLUMN</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7798">출력 열에는 정확히 하나의 CopyColumn 또는 PassThruColumn 속성이 지정되어 있어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7798">An output column must have exactly one CopyColumn or PassThruColumn property specified.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7799">이 오류는 CopyColumn 및 PassThruColumn 속성이 모두 비어 있지 않은 값으로 설정되지 않았거나 설정되었을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7799">This error occurs when neither the CopyColumn or the PassThruColumn properties, or both the CopyColumn and PassThruColumn properties, are set to non-empty values.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7800">0xC0208312</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7800">0xC0208312</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7801">-1071611118</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7801">-1071611118</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7802">DTS_E_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_PASSTHRU_COLUMN_NOT_FOUND</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7803">출력 열 '%3'에서 속성 '%2'에 대해 지정된 원본 계보 ID '%1!d!'을(를)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7803">The source lineage id '%1!d!'</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7804">입력 열 컬렉션에서 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7804">specified for property '%2' on output column '%3' was not found in the input column collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7805">이 오류는 출력 열에 통과 열로 지정된 입력 열 ID를 입력 집합에서 찾을 수 없을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7805">This occurs when the input column id specified on an output column as a passthrough column is not found in the set of inputs.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7887">0xC0208324</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7887">0xC0208324</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7888">-1071611100</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7888">-1071611100</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7889">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_MATCHCONTRIBUTION_AND_HIERARCHY_SPECIFIED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7889">DTS_E_TXFUZZY_MATCHCONTRIBUTION_AND_HIERARCHY_SPECIFIED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-7890">MatchContribution 및 계층 정보를 동시에 지정할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7890">Both MatchContribution and hierarchy information cannot be specified at the same time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-7891">두 속성은 모두 평가 계수를 측정하기 때문에 함께 지정될 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-7891">This is not allowed because these properties are both weighing factors for scoring.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9689">0x80047076</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9689">0x80047076</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9690">-2147192714</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9690">-2147192714</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9691">DTS_W_UNUSEDOUTPUTDATA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9691">DTS_W_UNUSEDOUTPUTDATA</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9692">출력 "%3"(%4!d!) 및 구성 요소 "%5"(%6!d!)의 출력 열 "%1"(%2!d!)은(는) 이후의 데이터 흐름 태스크에서 사용되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9692">The output column "%1" (%2!d!) on output "%3" (%4!d!) and component "%5" (%6!d!) is not subsequently used in the Data Flow task.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9693">사용되지 않는 이 출력 열을 제거하면 데이터 흐름 태스크 성능이 향상될 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9693">Removing this unused output column can increase Data Flow task performance.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9694">0x800470AE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9694">0x800470AE</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9695">-2147192658</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9695">-2147192658</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9696">DTS_W_COMPONENTREMOVED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9696">DTS_W_COMPONENTREMOVED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9697">구성 요소 "%1"(%2!d!)은(는) 해당 출력이 사용되지 않으며, 입력에 파생 작업이 없거나 입력이 다른 구성 요소의 출력에 연결되지 않기 때문에 데이터 흐름 태스크에서 제거되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9697">Component "%1" (%2!d!) has been removed from the Data Flow task because its output is not used and its inputs either have no side effects or are not connected to outputs of other components.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9698">이 구성 요소가 필요한 경우에는 적어도 하나 이상의 해당 입력에서 HasSideEffects 속성을 true로 설정하거나 해당 출력을 다른 항목에 연결해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9698">If the component is required, then the HasSideEffects property on at least one of its inputs should be set to true, or its output should be connected to something.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9699">0x800470B0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9699">0x800470B0</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9700">-2147192656</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9700">-2147192656</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9701">DTS_W_NOWORKTODO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9701">DTS_W_NOWORKTODO</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9702">행이 스레드에 제공되었지만 해당 스레드에 수행할 작업이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9702">Rows were given to a thread, but that thread has no work to do.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9703">레이아웃에 연결이 끊어진 출력이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9703">The layout has a disconnected output.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9704">RunInOptimizedMode 속성을 TRUE로 설정한 상태에서 파이프라인을 실행하면 속도가 더 빨라지며 이 경고가 발생하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9704">Running the pipeline with the RunInOptimizedMode property set to TRUE will be faster, and prevents this warning.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9722">0x800470D8</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9722">0x800470D8</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9723">-2147192616</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9723">-2147192616</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9724">DTS_W_EXPREVALPOTENTIALSTRINGTRUNCATION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9724">DTS_W_EXPREVALPOTENTIALSTRINGTRUNCATION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9725">식 "%1"의 결과 문자열이 최대 길이 %2!d!자를 초과할 경우 문자열이 잘릴 수</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9725">The result string for expression "%1" may be truncated if it exceeds the maximum length of %2!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9726">구성됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9726">characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9727">이 식은 DT_WSTR의 최대 크기를 초과하는 결과 값을 가질 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9727">The expression could have a result value that exceeds the maximum size of a DT_WSTR.</span></span>|

|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9741">0x8004801E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9741">0x8004801E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9742">-2147188706</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9742">-2147188706</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9743">DTS_W_COULDNOTFINDCURRENTVERSION</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9743">DTS_W_COULDNOTFINDCURRENTVERSION</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9744">구성 요소 %2에 대한 "%1" 값을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9744">Cannot find the "%1" value for component %2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9745">이 구성 요소에 대한 CurrentVersion 값을 찾을 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9745">The CurrentVersion value for the component cannot be located.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9746">이 오류는 DTSInfo 섹션에 CurrentVersion 값을 포함하도록 구성 요소가 해당 레지스트리 정보를 설정하지 않을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9746">This error occurs if the component has not set its registry information to contain a CurrentVersion value in the DTSInfo section.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9747">이 메시지는 특정 구성 요소를 개발 중이거나 구성 요소가 패키지에서 사용될 때, 해당 구성 요소가 올바르게 등록되지 않은 경우에 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9747">This message occurs during component development, or when the component is used in a package, if the component is not registered properly.</span></span>|
