|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9799">0x80208305</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9799">0x80208305</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9800">-2145352955</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9800">-2145352955</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9801">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_DELIMITERS_DONT_MATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9801">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_DELIMITERS_DONT_MATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9802">지정한 구분 기호가 기존의 일치하는 인덱스 "%1"을(를) 작성하는 데 사용되는 구분 기호와 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9802">The specified delimiters do not match the delimiters used to build the pre-existing match index "%1".</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9803">이 오류는 필드를 토큰화하는 데 사용되는 구분 기호가 일치하지 않을 때 발생합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9803">This error occurs when the delimiters used to tokenize fields do not match.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9804">이 오류는 일치 동작이나 결과에 알 수 없는 영향을 줄 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9804">This can have unknown effects on the matching behavior or results.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9805">0x80208308</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9805">0x80208308</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9806">-2145352952</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9806">-2145352952</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9807">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MAXRESULTS_IS_ZERO</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9807">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_MAXRESULTS_IS_ZERO</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9808">유사 항목 조회 변환의 MaxOutputMatchesPerInput 속성이 0입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9808">The MaxOutputMatchesPerInput property on the Fuzzy Lookup transformation is zero.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9809">결과가 생성되지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9809">No results will be produced.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9810">0x80208310</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9810">0x80208310</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9811">-2145352944</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9811">-2145352944</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9812">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9812">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_NO_FUZZY_JOIN_COLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9813">JoinType 열 속성이 Fuzzy로 설정된 올바른 입력 열이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9813">There were no valid input columns with JoinType column property set to Fuzzy.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9814">FuzzyLookup 대신 조회 변환을 사용하여 정확히 조인의 성능을 향상시킬 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9814">Performance on Exact joins may be improved by using the Lookup transform instead of FuzzyLookup.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9815">0x8020831C</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9815">0x8020831C</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9816">-2145352932</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9816">-2145352932</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9817">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_TIMESTAMPCAVEAT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9818">참조 열 "%1"이(가) SQL 타임스탬프 열일 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9818">The reference column "%1" may be a SQL timestamp column.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9819">유사 항목 일치 인덱스가 작성되고 참조 테이블 복사본이 생성되면 모든 참조 테이블 타임스탬프는 복사 시점의 현재 테이블 상태를 반영합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9819">When the fuzzy match index is built, and a copy of the reference table is made, all reference table timestamps will reflect the current state of the table at the time of the copy.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9820">CopyReferenceTable이 false로 설정된 경우 예기치 않은 동작이 발생할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9820">Unexpected behavior may occur if the CopyReferenceTable is set to false.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9821">0x80208321</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9821">0x80208321</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9822">-2145352927</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9822">-2145352927</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9823">DTS_W_MATCHINDEXALREADYEXISTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9824">MatchIndexName에 '%1' 테이블이 이미 지정되었고 DropExistingMatchIndex가 FALSE로 설정되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9824">A table with the name '%1' given for MatchIndexName already exists and DropExistingMatchIndex is set to FALSE.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9825">이 테이블을 삭제하지 않거나 다른 이름을 지정하지 않거나 DropExisitingMatchIndex를 TRUE로 설정하지 않으면 변환을 실행할 수 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9825">Transform execution will fail unless this table is dropped, a different name is specified, or DropExisitingMatchIndex is set to TRUE.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9826">0x8020832B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9826">0x8020832B</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9827">-2145352917</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9827">-2145352917</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9828">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_JOINLENGTHMISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9829">입력 열 '%1'의 길이가 대응시키려는 참조 열 '%2'의 길이와 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9829">The length of input column '%1' is not equal to the length of the reference column '%2' that it is being matched against.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9830">0x8020832D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9830">0x8020832D</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9831">-2145352915</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9831">-2145352915</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9832">DTS_W_TXFUZZYLOOKUP_CODEPAGE_MISMATCH</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9833">DT_STR 원본 열 "%1" 및 DT_STR 대상 열 "%2"의 코드 페이지가 일치하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9833">The code pages of the DT_STR source column "%1" and the DT_STR dest column "%2" do not match.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9834">이로 인해 예기치 않은 결과가 발생할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9834">This may cause unexpected results.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9835">0x8020832E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9835">0x8020832E</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9836">-2145352914</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9836">-2145352914</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9837">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_TOOMANYEXACTMATCHCOLUMNS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9838">정확히 일치 조인이 17개 이상이기 때문에 성능이 최적이 아닐 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9838">There are more than 16 exact match joins, so performance may not be optimal.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9839">성능을 향상시키려면 정확히 일치 조인 수를 줄이십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9839">Reduce the number of exact match joins to improve performance.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9840">SQL Server에서는 인덱스당 열 수가 16개로 제한되며 반전된 인덱스가 모든 조회에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9840">SQL Server has a limit of 16 columns per index, the inverted index will be used for all lookups.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9841">0x80208350</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9841">0x80208350</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9842">-2145352880</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9842">-2145352880</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9843">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_MEMLIMITANDEXHAUSTIVESPECIFIED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9844">Exhaustive 옵션을 사용하려면 전체 참조를 주 메모리에 로드해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9844">The Exhaustive option requires that the entire reference be loaded into main memory.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9845">MaxMemoryUsage 속성에 대해 메모리 제한이 지정되었으므로 전체 참조 테이블이 이 바운드 내에 맞지 않을 수 있으며 런타임 시 일치 작업이 실패할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9845">Since a memory limit has been specified for the MaxMemoryUsage property, it is possible that the entire reference table will not fit within this bound and that the match operation will fail at runtime.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9846">0x80208351</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9846">0x80208351</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9847">-2145352879</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9847">-2145352879</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9848">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHCOLUMNSEXCEEDBYTELIMIT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9848">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHCOLUMNSEXCEEDBYTELIMIT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9849">정확히 일치 조인에 지정된 열의 누적 길이가 인덱스 키에 대한 900바이트 제한을 초과합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9849">The cumulative lengths of the columns specified in the exact match joins exceeds the 900 byte limit for index keys.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9850">유사 항목 조회는 조회 성능을 향상시키기 위해 정확히 일치 열에서 인덱스를 만듭니다. 이 경우 이러한 인덱스 생성은 실패할 가능성이 있으며, 실패할 경우 일치하는 항목을 찾기 위해 더 느린 대체 방법이 조회에 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9850">Fuzzy Lookup creates an index on the exact match columns to increase lookup performance and there is a possibility that creation of this index may fail and the lookup will fall back to an alternative, possibly slower, method of finding matches.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9851">성능이 문제일 경우에는 정확히 일치 조인 열을 일부 제거하거나 가변 길이 정확히 일치 열의 최대 길이를 줄이십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9851">If performance is a problem, try removing some exact match join columns or reduce the maximum lengths of variable length exact match columns.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9852">0x80208352</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9852">0x80208352</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9853">-2145352878</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9853">-2145352878</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9854">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHINDEXCREATIONFAILED</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9854">DTS_W_FUZZYLOOKUP_EXACTMATCHINDEXCREATIONFAILED</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9855">정확히 일치 열에 대한 인덱스를 만들지 못했습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9855">Failed to create an index for exact match columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9856">대체 유사 항목 조회 방법으로 되돌리고 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9856">Reverting to alternative fuzzy lookup method.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9857">0x80208353</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9857">0x80208353</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9858">-2145352877</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9858">-2145352877</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9859">DTS_W_FUZZYGROUPINGINTERNALPIPELINEWARNING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9859">DTS_W_FUZZYGROUPINGINTERNALPIPELINEWARNING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9860">다음과 같은 경고 코드 0x%1!8.8X!의 유사 항목 그룹화 내부 파이프라인 경고가 발생했습니다: "%2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9860">The following Fuzzy Grouping internal pipeline warning occurred with warning code 0x%1!8.8X!: "%2".</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9861">0x80208375</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9861">0x80208375</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9862">-2145352843</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9862">-2145352843</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9863">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNLENGTHSETTODEFAULT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9863">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNLENGTHSETTODEFAULT</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9864">외부 데이터 형식 %2의 %1에 대해 최대 길이가 지정되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9864">No maximum length was specified for the %1 with external data type %2.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9865">길이가 %4!d!인 SSIS 데이터 흐름 태스크 데이터 형식 "%3"이(가)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9865">The SSIS Data Flow Task data type "%3" with a length of %4!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9866">사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9866">will be used.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9867">0x80208376</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9867">0x80208376</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9868">-2145352842</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9868">-2145352842</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9869">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEMAPPEDTOSTRING</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9869">DTS_W_XMLSRCOUTPUTCOLUMNDATATYPEMAPPEDTOSTRING</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9870">%1이(가) SSIS 데이터 흐름 태스크의 데이터 형식으로 매핑할 수 없는 외부 데이터 형식 %2을(를) 참조합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9870">The %1 references external data type %2, which cannot be mapped to a SSIS Data Flow Task data type.</span></span>  <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9871">길이가 %3!d!인 SSIS 데이터 흐름 태스크의 데이터 형식 DT_WSTR이 대신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9871">The SSIS Data Flow Task data type DT_WSTR with a length of %3!d!</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9872">사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9872">will be used instead.</span></span>|  
|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9873">0x80208385</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9873">0x80208385</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9874">-2145352827</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9874">-2145352827</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9875">DTS_W_NOREDIRECTWITHATTACHEDERROROUTPUTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9875">DTS_W_NOREDIRECTWITHATTACHEDERROROUTPUTS</span></span>|<span data-ttu-id="2e289-9876">오류 출력으로 전송된 행이 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9876">No rows will be sent to error output(s).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="2e289-9877">행을 오류 출력으로 리디렉션하도록 오류 또는 잘림 처리를 구성하거나 오류 출력에 연결된 데이터 흐름 변환 또는 대상을 삭제하십시오.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2e289-9877">Configure error or truncation dispositions to redirect rows to the error output(s), or delete data flow transformations or destinations that are attached to the error output(s).</span></span>|
